alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:32AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Madison and Carroll Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 932 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Urbanette to 5 miles southwest of Kingston. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Green Forest... Carrollton... Rudd... Kingston... Marble... Osage... Urbanette... Rule... Blue Eye... Dryfork... Cabanal... Metalton... Connor... Coin... Delmar... Denver... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
